p: All the patients and the health care workers were enquired for any irritation or discomfort following nasal douching and gargling. A total of 315 patients were evaluated and underwent nose and throat endoscopies. All except 7 were comfortable with PVP-I gargles and nasal drops ( Table 1 ). 17 health care workers used the 0.5% PVP-I nasal drops and gargles. No allergy was reported by any of the patients and health care workers.
